string.value: You booked a makeup artist. Report the good news to #bLana#k.
This time, you must book a hair stylist. Go over to #bMarshall#k and ask for help.
#bMarshall#k says he can't design Blake's hair. Why not? This can't be good. Discuss it with #bLana#k.
So? Did Tina agree to the job?\r\n#L0##bYes, Tina the makeup artist has agreed to take the job. She also wanted me to thank you for the gig.#l\n#k
I knew she'd agree, ha. Okay! Next on the list is...getting a hair stylist. You can do it, can't you?
I must have Marshall do Blake's hair. None of my stars get in front of an audience until Marshall's had his way with their hair. Please convince #bMarshall#k to help.
What, you don't think you can do it? This should be easy...

Bonjour. Do I know you? Apologies, but I am not working at the moment. Please...please just leave.\r\n#L0##bHi, I'm #h0#. I'm here to ask you if you'd do Blake's hair. He's making his debut as a singer soon and could use your help.#l\n#k
Ah, yes. I have heard that. I would be delighted to help, but alas, I think I cannot. I am sorry.\r\n#L0##bIs something wrong? Is there anything I can do to help?#l\n#k
No, no. I cannot possibly ask for help from someone I have just met. Pardon me...
Marshall is the best hair stylist in town. Please convince #bMarshall#k.
